metadata.title: CVE-2022-48799 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:perf: Fix list corruption in perf_cgroup_switch()There's list corruption on cgrp_cpuctx_list. This happens on thefollowing path:  perf_cgroup_switch: list_for_each_entry(cgrp_cpuctx_list)      cpu_ctx_sched_in         ctx_sched_in            ctx_pinned_sched_in              merge_sched_in                  perf_cgroup_event_disable: remove the event from the listUse list_for_each_entry_safe() to allow removing an entry duringiteration.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
linux-gcp-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
